alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 3:28PM MST until January 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT WINTER STORM TO IMPACT THE PACIFIC NORTHWEST MONDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph Tuesday morning. * WHERE...Post Falls, Davenport, Rockford, Downtown Spokane, Worley, Genesee, Spokane Valley, Coeur d`Alene, Fairfield, Moscow, Plummer, Cheney, Hayden, Potlatch, and Airway Heights. * WHEN...From 2 PM Monday to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will quickly transition to rain Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
